name: UpdateUserDetails
description:
Update a user's profile information.

Use this tool to modify the details of a user's profile based on their user ID. It updates user-specific information and returns the updated profile details.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string to identify the user whose details are to be updated.

parameters.name: department_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the user's department to be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the employee's department

parameters.name: employee_direct_manager_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the employee's direct manager. This ID links the employee to their manager within the system.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the employee's direct manager

parameters.name: user_first_name
parameters.description: The first name of the user to be updated. It must be a string.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: The last name of the user. This field is required for identifying and updating the user's profile.

parameters.name: location_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the employee's location for updating location details.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the employee's location

parameters.name: employee_role
parameters.description: The employee's role, restricted to Admin, Cardholder, or Bookkeeper. Note: Owner is not allowed.

value_schema.description: The employee's role; It could be one of the following values: Admin, Cardholder, Bookkeeper; Note that Owner is not a permissible value.

parameters.name: auto_promote_manager
parameters.description: Set to true to automatically promote the user's manager to manager.

value_schema.description: Whether to automatically promote the users manager to manager.

parameters.name: is_manager
parameters.description: Indicates whether the employee is a manager. Set to true if they are a manager, false otherwise.

value_schema.description: Whether the employee is a manager
